Potential Energy:

The energy held by an object due to its position relative to other objects, as well as stresses within itself, among other factors

Who are you?

My name is Cass. Sometimes I make things.

Like what?

I make websites, 3D models, and games. But usually websites.

With what?

I use a variety of tools and am always learning about new ones, but some of the tools I use consistiently are 11ty with Nunjucks, Svelte, MariaDB with PHP (often using PhpMyAdmin as a frontend, but I have CLI knowledge,) and SASS.

What can you do for me?

I can make a static or dynamic, single or multipage website depending on requirements, can create a WordPress or SquareSpace site, create simple 3D models and copy-write / proofread content for you, all for a fair price.

How can I contact you for work purposes?

You can contact me at potentialenergyxyz@proton.me.

Please only use this address for buisness-related purposes.
